dcterms:creator: C. L. Nguyen
O. Georgiou
G. Gradoni
M. Di Renzo
dcterms:description: A dataset for wireless fingerprinting localization in smart environments using reconfigurable intelligent surfaces, focusing on the use of random RIS configurations.
dcterms:title: Fingerprinting localization with random RIS configurations

dcterms:creator: Y. Liu
E. Liu
R. Wang
Y. Geng
dcterms:description: A dataset for active sensing with reconfigurable intelligent surfaces, focusing on wireless localization techniques.
dcterms:title: Active sensing with RIS

dcterms:creator: J. He
H. Wymeersch
T. Sanguanpuak
O. Silven
M. Juntti
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a hierarchical codebook for the reconfigurable intelligent surface, enabling adaptive beamforming design for joint localization and communication.
dcterms:title: Hierarchical codebook for the RIS

dcterms:creator: F. Sohrabi
Z. Chen
W. Yu
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on Cramér-Rao lower bound (CRLB) based localization, providing insights into adaptive beamforming for mmWave initial alignment.
dcterms:title: Cramér-Rao lower bound (CRLB) based localization

dcterms:creator: S. Hochreiter
J. Schmidhuber
dcterms:description: A foundational dataset for long short-term memory (LSTM) networks, which can be utilized for localization tasks by exploiting temporal correlations in measurements.
dcterms:title: LSTM based network for localization

dcterms:creator: T. Jiang
H. V. Cheng
W. Yu
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores learning to reflect and beamform for intelligent reflecting surfaces, focusing on implicit channel estimation.
dcterms:title: Learning to reflect and to beamform for intelligent reflecting surface

dcterms:creator: F. Sohrabi
T. Jiang
W. Cui
W. Yu
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on active sensing for communications by learning, which can be applied to enhance localization tasks.
dcterms:title: Active sensing for communications by learning
